duties_responsibilities.duty: Consult with clients in both business and technology dimensions and translate between them as needed.
Perform research & analysis into the project’s domain of the work, determine options, identify pros/cons and make recommendations while leading customers through the range of choices and decisions.
Produce written requirement specifications, stories, and other artifacts in software development life-cycle (SDLC).
Work with technical architects and developers to research and assess various technologies that can be used together to solve a business problem.
Work closely with clients, architects, developers, creative digital design team, QA, and project managers to deliver solutions that solve business problems.
Manage multiple streams of projects, identify and manage priorities.
Assist in sales from an analysis point of view – analyze & estimating projects.
Works with clients/testers to ensure the product meets the client’s requirements.
Bring market insights gained through various projects as feedback into the company’s overall strategy, process, and practices.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Business, Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
